title: Ticket #6325: late materialization expands $(Process) early when list has http: file
description:
The creation of the late materialization digest file is supposed to skip expanding $(Process) in the digest file, and instead expand it only when materializing each job.

This code is confused when the same line as a : later on, such as when a transfer input files line has an http:// file on it. Thus the following submit line 

submit fragment
transfer_input_files = ./$(Process).dat, http://example.com/data
incorrectly becomes this line in the digest 
incorrect submit digest fragment
transfer_input_files = ./0.dat, http://example.com/data
